open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.

updates.content: Delft will be put on hold due to hostility with local gangs. No maintenance and installations will take place. Contractors are not able to enter the area.

closed.title: Afrihost Outage | National
closed.description: We are investigating reports of no connectivity affecting clients on the Afrihost network. We are working on identifying and resolving this issue as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may be causing.

updates.content: Full service has been restored. Our team is continuing to monitor the situation closely to ensure ongoing stability and optimal performance.
Our engineers are continuing with the restoration process following the earlier identified issue impacting connectivity on the Afrihost network. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Our engineers are still actively working on resolving the connectivity issue affecting clients on the Afrihost network. While we have identified the root cause, work is still ongoing to fully restore services. We understand the inconvenience this may be causing and assure you that restoring your connection remains our top priority.

We have identified the cause of the connectivity issue affecting clients on the Afrihost network and are actively working on a resolution. Our team is committed to restoring services as quickly as possible. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your patience while we resolve this matter.
